name: Gigglepond
description: A pond that giggles every time a duck lands.

name: Rumblelake
description: Waves slap the shore like they’ve got opinions.

name: Whisperwater
description: The lake murmurs secrets to your toes at night.

name: Klucklepool
description: Sounds like a chicken clucking underwater.

name: Babbleriver
description: Can’t shut up. Has opinions about everything.

name: Snortfjord
description: Blows bubbles when no one’s looking.

name: Drizzlepond
description: Always looks like it’s about to rain, but never does.

name: Twistyriver
description: Flows in squiggles and spiral loops.

name: Flaplagoon
description: Everything slaps louder here: fish, water, pride.

name: Twitchlake
description: Ripples for no reason. Makes people suspicious.

name: Glimmerpond
description: Reflects your face, but slightly more confused.

name: Hiccup Creek
description: Water hiccups upstream. Nobody knows why.

name: Plopstream
description: Perfect for dramatic ‘plop’ entrances and exits.

name: The Murmurlock
description: A dark lake that hums lullabies to no one.

name: Splishfjord
description: A narrow bay where everything sounds wetter.

name: Echo Marsh
description: Your thoughts echo back in sarcastic tone.

name: Crinkle Bay
description: Waves fold like bed sheets. Smells faintly of socks.

name: Hushstream
description: So quiet it makes your brain louder.

name: Bouncepond
description: Pebbles bounce back when thrown. It’s personal.

name: Gurglecreek
description: Like a baby laughing in soup form.

name: Titterlagoon
description: You can’t go five minutes without giggling.

name: Flickerflow
description: Water flickers like a confused GIF.

name: Mosswhisper Tarn
description: Small lake surrounded by shy moss that gossips when wet.

name: Dribbleloch
description: Technically a lake. Emotionally a sneeze.

name: Sprinklefen
description: No one knows where the water comes from. Or goes.
